run

public static UnivariateGaussianMixtureModel run(Point[] points,
                                                 UnivariateGaussianMixtureModel m)
Performs the Expectation-Maximization algorithm. The parameters estimated corresponds to univariate Gaussian distributions.

Parameters:
points - point set
m - initial mixture model
Returns:
learned mixture model
